        public Trick(java.lang.String name,
             int points,
             java.lang.String requi1a,

             java.lang.String requi2a,
             java.lang.String requi2b)
        The constructor of a trick
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the trick
        points - The points it gives
        requi1a - The first card required
        requi1b - The alternative to the first card. If the same, put the same card
        requi2a - The second card required
        requi2b - The alternative to the second card.
